HotelDescriptiveContent.HotelName: JW Marriott Hotel Rio de Janeiro

Description.Name: Executive Floor Service Description
Description.Text: Breakfast, Happy Hour, Private Check In

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: One of the new Seven Wonders of the World, Christ the Redeemer is an icon of Rio de Janeiro.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Right in front of the JW Marriott is the world famous Copacabana beach with all its beauty and views

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Straight out of Guanabara Bay, the spectacular Sugar Loaf Mountain is a symbol of Rio de Janeiro.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: The Maracana Stadium is a must see for sports fans visiting Rio de Janeiro.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Every year during Carnival, the Sambodromo in Rio de Janeiro turns into a parade stadium.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: The Municipal Theatre presents a wide variety of musical and theatrical shows in Rio de Janeiro.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Rio de Janeiro hotel deals offer a unique experience of luxury and sophistication for your honeymoon

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: 2,345 sq. ft. Wayana Ballroom divides into 2 sections, hosting up to 230 guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Our rooftop provides a spectacular view of Rio's beautiful Copacabana beach and Sugarloaf Mountain.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Our Rio hotel offers personalized catering services for weddings, social events and theme parties.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Wedding packages include special amenities to make your Rio de Janeiro wedding unforgettable.

Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: Rates quoted in USD-payable at hotel in local currency/Maximum room occupancy is 2/Only suites can accommodate 3 people

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: 12 meeting rooms; largest is the Wayana with a maximum of 2,345 sq ft, seating up to 230.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Enjoy creative coffee-breaks and premium menus or cocktails for your Rio de Janeiro meetings.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: High speed & wireless internet access throughout all meeting rooms & public areas.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Exclusive Red Coat staff handles every detail in your Copacabana Rio de Janeiro meetings.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Event Technology services, with state-of-the art equipment and professional AV technicians.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: 245 refined guest rooms provide the ultimate Rio de Janeiro vacation accommodations.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: The Griffin Club offers special services, including complimentary daily breakfast & happy hour.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Rio de Janeiro Hotel accommodations with Marriott's new bedding & plush bathrobes.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: WiFi, phone/voice mail, work desk, hair dryer, iron/ironing board, laptop size safe, Ipod deck.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Room services include newspaper delivery, 24-hour room service, daily housekeeping & turndown.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Enjoy all the city has to offer while enjoying your luxury Rio de Janeiro Brazil hotel room.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: 245 refined guest rooms provide the ultimate Rio de Janeiro vacation accommodations.
The Griffin Club offers special services, including complimentary daily breakfast & happy hour.
Rio de Janeiro Hotel accommodations with Marriott's new bedding & plush bathrobes.
WiFi, phone/voice mail, work desk, hair dryer, iron/ironing board, laptop size safe, Ipod deck.
Room services include newspaper delivery, 24-hour room service, daily housekeeping & turndown.
Enjoy all the city has to offer while enjoying your luxury Rio de Janeiro Brazil hotel room.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: The JW Marriott Hotel Rio de Janeiro on Copacabana Beach is near major attractions. Luxurious guest rooms, suites & apartments, rooftop fitness center, pool & day spa. Onsite dining, high-speed Internet, 12 meeting rooms with catering available.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Rio de Janeiro is a state of mind - an endless celebration of life, exquisitely captured by the JW Marriott Hotel Rio de Janeiro, one of the premier Copacabana hotels in Brazil. Rio's magic can be enjoyed from the rooftop pool, with sweeping views of Sugar Loaf Mountain, Corcovado, and Christ the Redeemed, the most famous Rio de Janeiro attractions. The JW Marriott Hotel Rio de Janeiro offers luxury accommodations wired with high-speed Internet access and designed for supreme comfort. For hours of rest and relaxation, visit our Rio de Janeiro Spa & Fitness Center. You will be tempted with the delicious menus at Lounge Bar Restaurante The Carioca. Should you need a luxury hotel in Rio de Janeiro for social or business events, our elegant meeting and conference facilities provide our renowned JW Marriott services, fine catering and technology.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Our Copacabana hotel has a superb view of the main Rio de Janeiro tourist attractions including the famous Copacabana beach and nearby downtown. The JW Marriott Rio de Janeiro allows you to explore South America's premier International Gate Way City.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award 2012 - Luxury and The 25 Best

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: 1st Place: Great Place to Work Rio de Janeiro - Best Companies 2014

Description.Name: Airport Name/Code
Description.Text: Rio de Janeiro/GaleoAntonio Carlos Jobim International Airport (GIG)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take Linha Vermelha and follow the signs to Centro/ Copacabana, Perimetral. Then take Aterro do Flamengo, Praia de Botafogo, cross Tunnel do Pasmado and Tunnel Novo. Take Avenida Princesa Isabel and turn right at Avenida Atlantica. Go straight to Posto Quatro.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Go down Avenida Atlantica, than take Avenida Princesa Isabel. Go straight to Aterro do Flamengo.

Transportation.Description: Drive Time to Airport in Rush Hour
Subway from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)
Rail from Airport to Hotel Fee (one-way)

Message Text
Description.Text: EARN UP TO 50,000 POINTS PER EVENTBook a meeting or event with us and earn Marriott Rewards points or airline miles. Its up to you. Whether its a conference, business meeting or social event, youll qualify for points anytime you book 10 or more guest rooms for at least one night.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: EARN UP TO 50,000 POINTS PER EVENTBook a meeting or event with us and earn Marriott Rewards points or airline miles. Its up to you. Whether its a conference, business meeting or social event, youll qualify for points anytime you book 10 or more guest rooms for at least one night.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: If you plan to attend the matches in Rio de Janeiro, you can score a vacation package and stay right on the beach in the Copacabana district.Rio de Janeiro is a state of mind - a celebration of life, exquisitely captured by the JW Marriott Hotel Rio de Janeiro, one of the premier Copacabana hotels.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Located at the heart of Copacabana beach, about 15 minutes from downtown.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Equipped to receive business travelers, JW Marriott Rio de Janeiro offers wireless internet at public areas and high speed internet at every room, besides a 24h business center.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Our hotel has 9 meeting rooms with many possibilities for catering and state of art event technology.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: Personalized and proactive service from check in to check out.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: 24h fitness center at the MIrante Health Club, located at the hotel's rooftop. Work out with the best view of Copacabana beach!

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Our Executive Lounge was totally renewed at 2008 to become a space specilly designed for the business traveler needs.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Change of carpet, TV, ipod deck, curtain, bed linen and ergonomic chair.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Change of the workstation (table); lampshades, curtains and nightstands for modern furniture. The TV was also hanging on the wall giving more amplitude to the room.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: Lobby and restaurant renovation from April 15-August 15, 2013 to create dynamic experience, flexible and integrated environment. Minimal guest impact.
